summary: The diff shows modifications to 4 files: TopicSelector.tsx (frontend component), AdminPage.tsx (frontend page), frontend-file-summaries.txt (documentation), and project_state.json (state tracking). These changes appear to be a rebuild/redeploy of the existing application without feature changes. The modifications align with REQ-16's requirement to rebuild and redeploy the full application in its current state. The diff does not show backend Motoko actor changes, but the frontend components match described existing features. No new features appear to have been added, and no existing features appear removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: The backend Motoko actor deploys successfully with all existing questions and result storage functions intact.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend Motoko actor files are present in the diff. There are no changes to any .mo files or backend configuration, so it cannot be confirmed from the diff that the backend was rebuilt or redeployed.
